3 #include <unicorn/unicorn_statemachine.h>

5 int main(int argc, char **argv)
6 {
7  ros::init(argc, argv, "unicorn_statemachine");
8  UnicornState statemachine;
9  statemachine.printUsage();
10  ros::Rate r(50);
11  while (ros::ok())
12  {
13  statemachine.active();
14  ros::spinOnce();
15  r.sleep();
16  }
17  return 0;
18 }
19 
20 PidController::PidController(float Kp, float Ki, float Kd, float tolerance)
21  : Kp_(Kp), Ki_(Ki), Kd_(Kd), tolerance_(tolerance)
22 {
23  total_error_ = 0;
24  previous_error_ = 0;
25 }
26 
27 void PidController::setLimit(double lower, double upper)
28 {
29  lower_limit_ = lower;
30  upper_limit_ = upper;
31 }
32 
33 float PidController::limit(float term)
34 {
35  if (term < lower_limit_)
36  {
37  return lower_limit_;
38  }
39  else if (term > upper_limit_)
40  {
41  return upper_limit_;
42  }
43  return term;
44 }
45 
46 void PidController::control(float &var, float error)
47 {
48  float pidterm;
49  if (error < tolerance_)
50  {
51  total_error_ = 0;
52  }
53  total_error_ += error;
54  pidterm = error * Kp_ + total_error_ * Ki_ + (error - previous_error_) * Kd_;
55  previous_error_ = error;
56  var = limit(pidterm);
57 }

59 RefuseBin::RefuseBin()
60 {

62  y = -2.0;
63  yaw = 0;
64 }

85 UnicornState::UnicornState()
86  : move_base_clt_("move_base", true)
87 {
88  bool run_global_loc, sim_time;
89  std::string odom_topic;
90  if (!n_.getParam("use_sim_time", sim_time))
91  {
92  sim_time = false;
93  }
94  ROS_INFO("sim_time: %i", sim_time);
95 
96  if (!n_.getParam("max_angular_vel", MAX_ANGULAR_VEL))
97  {
98  MAX_ANGULAR_VEL = 0.5;
99  }
100  ROS_INFO("MAX_ANGULAR_VEL: %f", MAX_ANGULAR_VEL);
101  if (!n_.getParam("max_linear_vel", MAX_LINEAR_VEL))
102  {
103  MAX_LINEAR_VEL = 0.3;
104  }
105  ROS_INFO("MAX_LINEAR_VEL: %f", MAX_LINEAR_VEL);
106  if (!n_.getParam("odometry_topic", odom_topic))
107  {
108  odom_topic = "odom";
109  }
110  if (!n_.getParam("frame_id", frame_id_))
111  {
112  frame_id_ = "base_link";
113  }
114 
115  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Robot frame_id: %s", frame_id_.c_str());
116  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Listening to %s", odom_topic.c_str());

118  // unicorn_state_sub_ = n_.subscribe("/TX2_unicorn_state", 0, &UnicornState::stateCallback, this);
119  move_base_cancel_pub_ = n_.advertise<actionlib_msgs::GoalID>("/move_base/cancel", 0);
120  amcl_global_clt_ = n_.serviceClient<std_srvs::Empty>("/global_localization");
121  cmd_vel_pub_ = n_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Twist>("/unicorn/cmd_vel", 0);
122

164 void UnicornState::globalLocalization()
165 {
166  std_srvs::Empty srv;
167  ros::service::waitForService("/global_localization", 1);
168 
169  if (amcl_global_clt_.call(srv))
170  {
171  ROS_INFO("[am_unicorn_interface]: Initialized amcl global localization");
172  }
173  else
174  {
175  ROS_ERROR("[am_unicorn_interface]: Failed to initialize amcl global localization");
176  }
177 }
178 
179 int UnicornState::getCharacter()
180 {
181  static struct termios oldt, newt;
182  tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, &oldt); // save old settings
183  newt = oldt;
184  newt.c_lflag &= ~(ICANON); // disable buffering
185  newt.c_cc[VMIN] = 0;
186  newt.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
187  tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &newt); // apply new settings
188 
189  int c = getchar(); // read character (non-blocking)
190 
191  tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, &oldt); // restore old settings
192  return c;
193 }
194 
195 std::string UnicornState::stateToString(int state)
196 {
197  switch (state)
198  {
199  case current_state::AUTONOMOUS:
200  return "AUTONOMOUS";
201 
202  case current_state::MANUAL:
203  return "MANUAL";
204 
205  case current_state::LOADING:
206  return "LOADING";
207 
208  case current_state::IDLE:
209  return "IDLE";
210 
211  case current_state::LIFT:
212  return "LIFT";
213 
214  case current_state::REVERSING:
215  return "REVERSING";
216 
217  case current_state::ALIGNING:
218  return "ALIGNING";
219 
220  case current_state::ENTERING:
221  return "ENTERING";
222 
223  case current_state::EXITING:
224  return "EXITING";
225 
226  default:
227  return "INVALID STATE";
228  }
229 }

231 int UnicornState::getInput(float &val)
232 {
233  float tmp;
234  if (!(std::cin >> tmp))
235  {
236  std::cin.clear();
237  std::cin.ignore();
238  ROS_ERROR("Incorrect entry. Try again.");
239  printUsage();
240  return 0;
241  }
242  val = tmp;
243  return 1;
244 }
245 
246 bool UnicornState::accGoalServer(unicorn::CharlieCmd::Request &req, unicorn::CharlieCmd::Response &res)
247 {
248  if (state_ == current_state::MANUAL)
249  {
250  res.response = 0;
251  return false;
252  }
253  if (sendGoal(req.goal.x, req.goal.y, req.goal.theta))
254  {
255  res.response = 1;
256  }
257  else
258  {
259  res.response = 0;
260  }
261 }
262 
263 void UnicornState::processKey(int c)
264 {
265  float x, y, yaw;
266  if (c == 'h')
267  {
268  cancelGoal();
269  }
270  else if (c == 'l')
271  {
272  globalLocalization();
273  }
274  else if (c == '1')
275  {
276  if (state_ == current_state::MANUAL)
277  {
278  ROS_ERROR("Manual drive is active!");
279  }
280  else
281  {
282  std::cout << "Target x: ";
283  if (!getInput(x))
284  {
285 
286  return;
287  }
288  std::cout << "Target y: ";
289  if (!getInput(y))
290  {
291 
292  return;
293  }
294  std::cout << "Target yaw: ";
295  if (!getInput(yaw))
296  {
297 
298  return;
299  }
300  target_x_ = x;
301  target_y_ = y;
302  target_yaw_ = yaw;
303  sendGoal(x, y, yaw);
304  updateAndPublishState(current_state::AUTONOMOUS);
305  printUsage();
306  }
307  }
308  else if (c == '2')
309  {
310  cancelGoal();
311  updateAndPublishState(current_state::IDLE);
312  printUsage();
313  }
314  else if (c == '3')
315  {
316  cancelGoal();
317  move_base_active_ = 0;
318  updateAndPublishState(current_state::MANUAL);
319  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
320  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
321  printUsage();
322  }
323  else if (c == '4')
324  {
325  std::cout << "Refuse bin x: ";
326  if (!getInput(refuse_bin_pose_.x))
327  return;
328  std::cout << "Refuse bin y: ";
329  if (!getInput(refuse_bin_pose_.y))
330  return;
331  std::cout << "Refuse bin yaw: ";
332  if (!getInput(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw))
333  return;
334  // state_ = current_state::LOADING;
335  updateAndPublishState(current_state::ALIGNING);
336 
337  //loading_state_ = current_state::ALIGNING;
338  // man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
339  // man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
340  printUsage();
341  }
342  else if (c == '5')
343  {
344  std::cout << "Target x: ";
345  if (!getInput(x))
346  return;
347  std::cout << "Target y: ";
348  if (!getInput(y))
349  return;
350  std::cout << "Target yaw: ";
351  if (!getInput(yaw))
352  return;
353  sendMoveCmd(x, y, yaw);
354  updateAndPublishState(current_state::AUTONOMOUS);
355  printUsage();
356  }
357  else if (c == '6')
358  {
359  updateAndPublishState(current_state::LIFT);
360  }
361  else if (c == '7')
362  {
363  updateAndPublishState(current_state::ALIGNING);
364  }
365 }
366 
367 void UnicornState::printUsage()
368 {
369  std::cout << "------------------- State: " << stateToString(state_).c_str() << " -------------------" << std::endl
370  << "1: Specify new goal 2: Idle mode 3: Manual control 4: Init Load 5: Send command 6: Lift" << std::endl
371  << "H: Pause execution L: Init global localization" << std::endl; // ADDED OPTTION 6 BY MUJI
372 }

374 void UnicornState::stateCallback(const std_msgs::Int32 &msg)
375 {
376  std::cout << "Received the following state: " << msg.data << std::endl;
377  return;
378 }

380 void UnicornState::odomCallback(const nav_msgs::Odometry &msg)
381 {
382  tf::Pose pose;
383  tf::poseMsgToTF(msg.pose.pose, pose);
384  current_yaw_ = tf::getYaw(pose.getRotation());
385  current_vel_ = msg.twist.twist.linear.x;
386 }
387 
388 void UnicornState::lidarBackCallback(const std_msgs::Bool &msg)
389 {
390  if (msg.data)
391  {
392  ROS_INFO("Rear lidar message: at desired range!");
393  if ((state_ == current_state::AUTONOMOUS) || (state_ == current_state::ALIGNING) || (state_ == current_state::ENTERING))
394  {
395  ROS_INFO("Rear lidar message: at desired range halting operation.");
396  cancelGoal();
397  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
398  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
399  atDesiredDistance_ = true;
400  }
401  }
402  else
403  {
404  atDesiredDistance_ = false;
405  }
406 }

440 void UnicornState::LiftCallback(const std_msgs::Int8 &recieveMsg) // ADDED BY MUJI
441 {
442  if (recieveMsg.data == 2)
443  {
444  ROS_INFO("ACK has been recieved! The liftsystem is working!");

446  if (recieveMsg.data == 3)
447  {
448  ROS_INFO("Lifting is done!");

452 void UnicornState::active()
453 {
454  int c = getCharacter();
455  processKey(c);
456 
457  // float current_range = 0;
458 
459  /*Legacy Range Sensor Code - START*/
460  /*Needs to be altered*/
461  // for (std::map<std::string, RangeSensor *>::iterator it = range_sensor_list_.begin(); it != range_sensor_list_.end(); ++it)
462  // {
463  // current_range += it->second->getRange();
464  // }
465  // current_range /= range_sensor_list_.size();
466 
467  /*Legacy Range Sensor Code - END*/
468  switch (state_)
469  {
470  case current_state::AUTONOMOUS:
471  if (move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
472  {
473  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Goal reached");
474  updateAndPublishState(current_state::IDLE);
475 
476  //state_= current_state::LIFT;
477  //state_ = current_state::IDLE;
478  printUsage();
479  }
480  break;
481 
482  case current_state::MANUAL:
483  if (c == 'a')
484  {
485  if (man_cmd_vel_.angular.z < MAX_ANGULAR_VEL)
486  {
487 
488  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z += MAX_ANGULAR_VEL;
489  }
490  }
491  else if (c == 'w')
492  {
493  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = MAX_LINEAR_VEL;
494  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
495  }
496  else if (c == 'd')
497  {
498  if (man_cmd_vel_.angular.z > -MAX_ANGULAR_VEL)
499  {
500  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z -= MAX_ANGULAR_VEL;
501  }
502  }
503  else if (c == 's')
504  {
505  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
506  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0;
507  }
508  else if (c == 'x')
509  {
510  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -MAX_LINEAR_VEL;
511  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
512  }
513  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
514  break;
515 
516  case current_state::LOADING:
517  break;
518 
519  case current_state::LIFT:
520  //ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] lift signal is %d", lifted_); // Uncommented BY MUJI
521  // reversing_ = 0;
522  //if (lifted_ == 0 || lifted_ == 1)
523  // {}
524  //else
525  // {
526  // lifted_ == 0;
527  //}
528  // ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] lifter_: %d",lifted_);
529 
530  //if (lifted_ == 0)
531  //{
532  // lift_.data = 1;
533  // lifted_ = 1;
534  // }
535  //else
536  //{
537  //lift_.data = 0;
538  //lifted_ = 0;
539  //}
540  //ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] send lift signal %d",lift_.data);
541  //lift_pub_.publish(lift_);
542 
543 
544  ROS_INFO("Activation of the liftsystem is requested!");
545  ROS_INFO("Sending Messsage to the liftsystem!");
546 
547  lift_.data = 1;
548  lift_publisher.publish(lift_);
549  updateAndPublishState(current_state::IDLE);
550  printUsage();
551  break;
552 
553 
554  case current_state::ALIGNING:
555 
556  if (!move_base_active_)
557  {
558  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Aligning with garbage disposal...");
559 
560  sendGoal(refuse_bin_pose_.x + 1.5 * cos(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw), refuse_bin_pose_.y + 1.5 * sin(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw), refuse_bin_pose_.yaw);
561  move_base_active_ = 1;
562 
563  return;
564  }
565  if (move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
566  {
567  move_base_active_ = 0;
568  // reversing_ = 1;
569  updateAndPublishState(current_state::ENTERING);
570 
571  //loading_state_ = current_state::ENTERING;
572  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entering garbage disposal");
573  }
574  break;
575 
576  case current_state::ENTERING:
577  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
578  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.1;
579  reversing_ = true;
580  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Current vel: %f", current_vel_);
581  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] atDesiredDistance_ %d", atDesiredDistance_);
582  if (atDesiredDistance_)
583  {
584  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
585  cancelGoal();
586  updateAndPublishState(current_state::LIFT);
587  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entered lifting mode. Waiting for lift completion message.");
588  }
589  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
590  break;
591 
592 =======
593 
594  case current_state::ALIGNING:
595 
596  if (!move_base_active_)
597  {
598  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Aligning with garbage disposal...");
599 
600  sendGoal(refuse_bin_pose_.x + 1.5 * cos(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw), refuse_bin_pose_.y + 1.5 * sin(refuse_bin_pose_.yaw), refuse_bin_pose_.yaw);
601  move_base_active_ = 1;
602 
603  return;
604  }
605  if (move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
606  {
607  move_base_active_ = 0;
608  // reversing_ = 1;
609  updateAndPublishState(current_state::ENTERING);
610 
611  //loading_state_ = current_state::ENTERING;
612  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entering garbage disposal");
613  }
614  break;
615 
616  case current_state::ENTERING:
617  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
618  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.1;
619  reversing_ = true;
620  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Current vel: %f", current_vel_);
621  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] atDesiredDistance_ %d", atDesiredDistance_);
622  if (atDesiredDistance_)
623  {
624  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
625  cancelGoal();
626  updateAndPublishState(current_state::LIFT);
627  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entered lifting mode. Waiting for lift completion message.");
628  }
629  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
630  break;
634  // case current_state::ENTERING:
635 
636  // man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
637  // reversing_ = 1;
638  // man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.2;
639 
640  // ROS_INFO("Current vel: %f", current_vel_);
641  // ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] bumperPressed_ %d", bumperPressed_);
642  // if (bumperPressed_ == 1)
643  // {
644  // man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
645  // cancelGoal();
646  // updateAndPublishState(current_state::LIFT);
647 
648  // ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entered garbage disposal. Waiting for exit signal");
649  // }
650  // else
651  // {
652  // man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.1;
653  // }
654 
655  // cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
656 
657  // break;
658 
659  case current_state::EXITING:
660  printUsage();
661  if (c == 'k')
662  {
663  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Exiting garbage disposal");
664  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.15;
665  }
666  {
667  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
668  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Loading complete!");
669  updateAndPublishState(current_state::IDLE);
670 
671  printUsage();
672  }
673  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
674  reversing_ = 0;
675  break;
676  }
677 }
678 
679 int UnicornState::sendGoal(const float &x, float y, float yaw)
680 {
681  try
682  {
683  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(x);
684  }
685  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &e)
686  {
687  ROS_INFO("%s", e.what());
688  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] x is undefined");
689  updateAndPublishState(current_state::IDLE);
690  return -1;
691  }
692  try
693  {
694  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(y);
695  }
696  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
697  {
698  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] y is undefined");
699  updateAndPublishState(current_state::IDLE);
700  return -1;
701  }
702  try
703  {
704  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(yaw);
705  }
706  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
707  {
708  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] yaw is undefined");
709  updateAndPublishState(current_state::IDLE);
710  return -1;
711  }
712  while (!move_base_clt_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)))
713  {
714  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
715  }
716 
717  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
718  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = "map";
719  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
720  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = x;
721  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = y;
722  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
723 
724  move_base_clt_.sendGoal(goal);
725 
726  return 1;
727 }
728 
729 void UnicornState::sendMoveCmd(float x, float y, float yaw)
730 {
731  try
732  {
733  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(x);
734  }
735  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
736  {
737  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] x is undefined");
738  return;
739  }
740  try
741  {
742  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(y);
743  }
744  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
745  {
746  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] y is undefined");
747  return;
748  }
749  try
750  {
751  float check_input = boost::lexical_cast<float>(yaw);
752  }
753  catch (boost::bad_lexical_cast &)
754  {
755  ROS_ERROR("[unicorn_statemachine] yaw is undefined");
756  return;
757  }
758  while (!move_base_clt_.waitForServer(ros::Duration(5.0)))
759  {
760  ROS_INFO("Waiting for the move_base action server to come up");
761  }
762 
763  move_base_msgs::MoveBaseGoal goal;
764  goal.target_pose.header.frame_id = frame_id_.c_str();
765  goal.target_pose.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
766  goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = x;
767  goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = y;
768  goal.target_pose.pose.orientation = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromYaw(yaw);
769 
770  move_base_clt_.sendGoal(goal);
771 }
772 
773 void UnicornState::cancelGoal()
774 {
775  actionlib_msgs::GoalID cancel_all;
776  move_base_cancel_pub_.publish(cancel_all);
777  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Canceling move_base goal");
778 }
779 
780 void UnicornState::giveOrder()
781 {
782  /* takes input to a goal in x,y and yaw */
783  float x, y, yaw;
784  std::cout << "Target x: ";
785  if (!getInput(x))
786  {
787 
788  return;
789  }
790  std::cout << "Target y: ";
791  if (!getInput(y))
792  {
793 
794  return;
795  }
796  std::cout << "Target yaw: ";
797  if (!getInput(yaw))
798  {
799 
800  return;
801  }
802  target_x_ = x;
803  target_y_ = y;
804  target_yaw_ = yaw;
805  sendGoal(x, y, yaw);
806 
807  /* Go to a given goal */
808  if (move_base_clt_.getState() == actionlib::SimpleClientGoalState::SUCCEEDED)
809  {
810  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Goal reached");
811  if (!holdingBin_)
812  {
813  reverse();
814  lift();
815  // do thit a little while to get away from the rack
816  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
817  reversing_ = 1;
818  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.2;
819  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
820  lift();
821  giveOrder();
822  }
823  else if (holdingBin_)
824  {
825  lift();
826  reverse();
827  lift();
828  giveOrder();
829  }
830  }
831 }
832 
833 void UnicornState::reverse()
834 {
835  man_cmd_vel_.angular.z = 0;
836  reversing_ = 1;
837  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.2;
838 
839  ROS_INFO("Current vel: %f", current_vel_);
840  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] atDesiredDistance_ %d", atDesiredDistance_);
841  if (atDesiredDistance_)
842  {
843  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = 0.0;
844  cancelGoal();
845  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] Entered garbage disposal. Waiting for exit signal");
846  return;
847  }
848  else
849  {
850  man_cmd_vel_.linear.x = -0.1;
851  }
852 
853  cmd_vel_pub_.publish(man_cmd_vel_);
854 }
855 
856 void UnicornState::lift()
857 {
858  if (lifted_ == 0)
859  {
860  lift_.data = 1;
861  lifted_ = 1;
862  }
863  else
864  {
865  lift_.data = 0;
866  lifted_ = 0;
867  }
868  ROS_INFO("[unicorn_statemachine] send lift signal %d", lift_.data);
869  lift_pub_.publish(lift_);
870 }
871 /*Function used for debugging purposes.*/
872 void UnicornState::updateAndPublishState(int new_state)
873 {
874  state_ = new_state;
875  state_msg_.data = state_;
876  unicorn_state_pub_.publish(state_msg_);
877  return;
878 }
